author: insider@insider.com (Leo Aquino, CEPF)
description: Instead of panicking about inflation, a financial planner told Leo Aquino to calculate their personal inflation rate for groceries, gas, and more.
title: My personal rate of inflation is 14%, even though I'm spending less on groceries now than I did a year ago

description: The S&P 500 had closed in bear market territory on Monday, down 22 percent from its Jan 3. peak. European stocks wobbled, while Asian equities pared their losses.
